name: Food vendors in Lagos are hiring procurers for their business
title: Food vendors in Lagos are hiring procurers for their business; Here are five reasons why.
snippet: Top food vendors are applying this strategy to stay ahead of the competition, and it can save your food business by solving these five salient problems.

name: 9 popular markets in Lagos you need to visit
title: 9 popular markets in Lagos you need to visit if you need to buy pocket-friendly foodstuffs
snippet: Lagos is indubitably the commercial hub of Nigeria; it is a cosmopolitan metropolis that serves as a midpoint for trade, industrialization, and a financial paradise for food marketers.
